title: hey riot, can we have the animated icons from jhins teaser?
body: i cant be the only one who fell in love with the animated {{champion:238}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:37}} icons from jhins teaser i always thought riot would release them for purchase after jhins release because i thought animated icons would become the new thing. But over time i forgot about them and they so did the community but they came to mind again and im like wtf rito animated icons would be brilliant *cough* its a great cash grab *cough* but seriously can we make this a thing??
